description: Horizontal stripes of various types and colors of threads, alternating between densely woven and open weave. 2 Gold warp. Drk & Lt gold, lt olive, black, metallic gold & silver weft. Stapled to 8.5 x 11" card wih 99.1.1180.4.  "H-2" printed on face of card. Larsen descriptive label stapled to reverse. (golds, black, olive, metallic old & silver)
title: Fantasy B
